column1: Little Goat Diner////My friend decided on the grilled cheese which was a surprisingly huge sandwich and not what you expect in a grilled cheese. I didn't get a chance to taste it but he seemed to enjoy it. I did however
column2: snag several of his smoked fries. Like our waiter said
column3: there isn't really a smokey flavor to these so don't be turned away by the "smoked" name.
